dn2:6.2: sañcayo → sañjayo (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | belaṭṭhaputto → velaṭṭhaputto (sya-all); bellaṭṭhiputto (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn2:13.3: kañcideva desaṃ → kiñcideva desaṃ lesamattaṃ (sya-all, km, mr)
dn2:18.7: pakkamiṃ → pakkāmiṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | anikkujjanto → anikkujjento (sya-all, km, mr)
dn2:20.7: mahākappino → mahākappuno (si, pts-vp-pli1ed) | pavuṭā → paṭuvā (pts-vp-pli1ed); sapuṭā (mr)
dn2:23.2: paro loko → paraloko (sya-all) | sammaggatā → samaggagatā (sya-all); samaggatā (mr)
dn2:26.10: sattannaṃ tveva → sattannaṃyeva (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn2:35.13: deva, jāneyyāsi, yo te so puriso → yo te puriso (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
dn2:37.16: deva, jāneyyāsi, yo te so puriso → yo te puriso (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn2:42.1: sīlasampanno, indriyesu guttadvāro → bhojane mattaññū (bj, mr)
dn2:44.3: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ → pisuṇāvācaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | samaggarato → samaggarāmo (bj) | anuppadātā → anuppādātā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn2:51.2: nāḷikaṃ asiṃ → khaggaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); asiṃ khaggaṃ (sya-all, km); khaggaṃ asiṃ (mr)
dn2:52.2: janapadakathaṃ itthikathaṃ → itthikathaṃ purisakathaṃ (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1ed); itthīkathaṃ purisakathaṃ (sya2ed); itthikathaṃ purisakathaṃ kumārakathaṃ kumārikathaṃ (mr)
dn2:69.3: byantiṃ kareyya → byantīkareyya (bj, sya-all, km); vyantikareyya (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn2:70.5: na ca me → nacassa me (bj, mr)
dn2:80.1: paripphuṭāni → paripphaṭāni (sya-all); paripphuṭṭhāni (pts-vp-pli1ed) | nāssa → nassā (bj) | parisannāni → abhisannāni (sya1ed, sya2ed); abhisandāni parisandāni (mr)
dn2:83.1: So → puna caparaṃ mahārāja bhikkhu so (bj, mr)
dn2:84.2: pītaṃ vā lohitaṃ vā → pītakaṃ vā lohitakaṃ vā (mr)
dn2:86.1: īsikaṃ → isikaṃ (bj, sya-all); isīkaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | Seyyathā → seyyathāpi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | pavāheyya → pabbāheyya (sya-all, mr)
dn2:86.3: pavāḷhā’ti → pavālhāti (bj); pabbāḷhāti (cck, sya1ed, mr); pabāḷhāti (sya2ed)
dn2:96.1: rathikāyapi vīthiṃ sañcarante → rathiyā vītisañcarantenapi (bj); rathiyāya vithiṃ sañcarantepi (sya-all); rathiyā vīthi sañcarantepi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
